str2: Of Hebrew origin; properly, firm, i.e. trustworthy; adverbially, surely.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To go out, come out. From ek and erchomai; to issue.
A conjunction, preposition and adverb of continuance, until.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: From apo and didomi; to give away, i.e. Up, over, back, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Last, at the last, finally, till the end. A superlative probably from echo; farthest, final.
Of Latin origin; a quadrans, i.e. The fourth part of an as.
